name: Binibo
startIntroPart1: The Binibo, Masters of war and logistics. They are one of the most difficult countries to attack, for their enemies will be met by staunch formations that rival even mountains!
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to live up to their reputation?
declaringWar: I declare thou an enemy of my kingdom!
defeated: Bested, I was. Well done, noble foe.
neutralLetsHearIt: I will hear what you suggest.
hateLetsHearIt: I will hear, but not for long!
hateYes: You are lucky that I accept!
afterPeace: Let us not interfere in each other's buisness, eh?

name: Okosko
startIntroPart1: The Okosko. Masters of diplomacy and social reform. Wise and cunning, every kingdom reeks of future benefits in their eyes.
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to live up to their reputation?
declaringWar: It is nothing personal, my now enemy of the state.
defeated: I see that I was bested. Well done.
neutralLetsHearIt: I will give you a listen.
hateHello: You best have a good reason for this intrusion!
hateNo: No chance in all the world!
hateYes: However mad I am, I will not refuse this offer...
afterPeace: May we never cross blades again, for you and me...
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+75]% more Influence
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [1] turns
